title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to log into the account using registered email.

title: Payment Failed
description: Customer's payment failed due to gateway timeout on checkout page.

title: App Crash on Startup
description: Application crashes instantly whenever user tries to open on iOS.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Password reset email never arrived although requested several times.

title: Refund Request Pending
description: Refund request for cancelled order is pending without final approval.

title: Product Not Delivered
description: Order marked delivered in system but customer says item not received.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Website response time is extremely slow especially during heavy traffic.

title: Subscription Not Renewed
description: Customer's subscription renewal failed automatically without notification.

title: Incorrect Billing
description: Customer charged twice for the same order and wants refund immediately.

title: Account Locked
description: Too many failed login attempts caused account to be locked suddenly.

title: Delivery Address Not Updated
description: Updated delivery address ignored and old address used for shipment.

title: Feature Request
description: Customer requested a dark mode option as feature in mobile application.

title: Incorrect Product Received
description: Wrong product delivered in package instead of item originally ordered.

title: Mobile App Freezes
description: App freezes whenever user navigates to profile section or settings.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer refund for cancelled subscription still pending not processed.
